p: Gene cloning was performed as previously described [17]. The primers used to amplify the coding sequences of the KMPII, TRYP, and LACK genes have been described elsewhere [17] and the coding region of PAPLE22 (GenBank accession number AF123892) was amplified using forward 5′-GGCCACTTCTCTCTTCTCCA-3′ and reverse 5′-CTTGCCACATACACCAATCG-3′ primers. The coding sequences of each gene were cloned separately into the pVAX1™ vector (Invitrogen™, Carlsbad, CA, USA). Large-scale plasmid preparations were performed using an EndoFree® Plasmid Giga Kit (Qiagen®, Valencia, CA, USA) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
